location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J J Cross, Supra Cargo of the Duncan, at Bushire to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting instructions from the Resident as to whether it will be necessary for the Duncanto reduce the duration of its stops at Bushire and Muscat, in order to deliver a packet to India as quickly as possible. It also requests that the Resident makes a representation to the Governor of Bombay on behalf of the owners of the vessel for remuneration for losses incurred ferrying the packet in question.
